title: (x) J&CO Denim - Helvetica Inserat, Univers 67 & News Gothic {Chesh}
content:
Any assistance with identifying this typeface would be greatly appreciated!   
   
the distress was added after.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101030102554im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/8386.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content: I think there are actually three typefaces going on: the J&CO is [Helvetica Inserat](http://web.archive.org/web/20101030102554/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica-inserat/helvetica-inserat/testdrive.html?s=J%26CO&p=96), the DENIM may be [Univers 67 Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20101030102554/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/67-condensed-bold/testdrive.html?s=DENIM&p=96) or something similar, and the sideways type looks like [News Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20101030102554/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/news-gothic/).

oops. i didn't catch those R's on the right side.   
i was looking for a univers to match J&CO, but   
couldn't find one. i just assumed denim would   
be helvetica as well. good show. but why   
didn't inserat show up on my search @ myfonts?
